title: Pirates of the Caribbean movie font
content:
I'm lookingf for this font...Help!!   
Not Scurlock or Captain Kidd...... ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123023456im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/17167.jpg)

author: anonymous

comments.content:
We already had [this one](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123023456/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/13107.html).   
   
P.S. Hey, I never noticed the [last message](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123023456/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/13107.html#POST23123) in that thread.   
It's really nice to see someone put that [mini-tutorial](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123023456/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/10551.html#POST18130) I made   
to good use. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123023456im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

I search the Font not the style!   
Tnx! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123023456im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif))

THE CURSE OF THE BLACK PEARL   
Looks like bembo. Stretched
The Italian movie poster has the same font!
